AUTHOR: El Laggron
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for downloading this uploading cog ! Credits to **UltimatePancake** and **Sentry** who helped me for this cog. Also the commands are default accessible by everyone. If you want to change that, you should use the permissions cog.
NAME: say
SHORT: Allows you to make your bot say or upload something
DESCRIPTION: This cog will allow you to make your bot say your message, with auto-deletion of the command message, channel argument, DM or even file upload, like .gif or .png
